languages.text: {n}Один из гемункулов начинает говорить — привычно заносчиво.{/n} "Образец. Мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}встретились вновь{/d}. Твой побег из Комморры был одновременно статистической аномалией и тщедушной трусостью. Тебе полагалось погибнуть в Темном городе, а не переступать пределы собственной полезности. Ты наделал{mf||а} слишком много шума".

traits.locale_text: {n}Один из гемункулов начинает говорить — привычно заносчиво.{/n} "Образец. Мы встретились вновь. Твой побег из Комморры был одновременно статистической аномалией и тщедушной трусостью. Тебе полагалось погибнуть в Темном городе, а не переступать пределы собственной полезности. Ты наделал{mf||а} слишком много шума".
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}One of the Haemonculi starts to talk — with all the usual arrogance:{/n} "Specimen. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}meet again{/d}. Your escape from Commorragh was both a statistical anomaly and an act of abject cowardice. You should have died in the Dark City, instead of overstepping the limits of your own usefulness. You caused too much commotion."
languages.original_text: {n}Один из гемункулов начинает говорить — привычно заносчиво.{/n} "Образец. Мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}встретились вновь{/d}. Твой побег из Комморры был одновременно статистической аномалией и тщедушной трусостью. Тебе полагалось погибнуть в Темном городе, а не переступать пределы собственной полезности. Ты наделал{mf||а} слишком много шума".

Your escape from Commorragh was both a statistical anomaly and an act of abject cowardice. You should've died in the Dark City, instead of overstepping the limits of your own usefulness. You made too much noise."

languages.text: {n}其中一个血伶人开了口，语气中带着惯常的傲慢态度。{/n}“我们{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}又见面了{/d}，实验对象。你逃出了科摩罗，这既是统计上的异常状况，也是卑劣、懦弱的行为。你本该死在黑暗之城，不应该在实验结束之后继续活着。你制造了太多噪音，实在是过于吵闹。”
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Haemonculi starts to talk — with all the usual arrogance:{/n} "Specimen. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}meet again{/d}. Your escape from Commorragh was both a statistical anomaly and an act of abject cowardice. You should have died in the Dark City, instead of overstepping the limits of your own usefulness. You caused too much commotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}其中一个血伶人开了口，语气中带着惯常的傲慢态度。{/n}“我们又见面了，实验对象。你逃出了科摩罗，这既是统计上的异常状况，也是卑劣、懦弱的行为。你本该死在黑暗之城，不应该在实验结束之后继续活着。你制造了太多噪音，实在是过于吵闹。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Einer der Haemonculi beginnt zu sprechen – mit all der üblichen Arroganz.{/n} "Das Versuchsstück. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}So sehen wir uns wieder{/d}. Eure Flucht aus Commorragh war sowohl eine statistische Anomalie als auch ein Akt unerhörter Feigheit. Ihr hättet in der Dunklen Stadt sterben sollen, statt die Grenzen Eurer eigenen Nützlichkeit zu überschreiten. Ihr habt zu viel Aufruhr gemacht."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Haemonculi starts to talk — with all the usual arrogance:{/n} "Specimen. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}meet again{/d}. Your escape from Commorragh was both a statistical anomaly and an act of abject cowardice. You should have died in the Dark City, instead of overstepping the limits of your own usefulness. You caused too much commotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einer der Haemonculi beginnt zu sprechen — mit all der üblichen Arroganz.{/n} "Das Versuchsstück. So sehen wir uns wieder. Eure Flucht aus Commorragh war sowohl eine statistische Anomalie als auch ein Akt unerhörter Feigheit. Ihr hättet in der Dunklen Stadt sterben sollen, statt die Grenzen Eurer eigenen Nützlichkeit zu überschreiten. Ihr habt zu viel Lärm gemacht."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Uno de los hemónculos empieza a hablar con su arrogancia de costumbre.{/n} «{mf|El|La} espécimen. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}Nos volvemos a encontrar{/d}. Tu fuga de Commorragh fue una anomalía estadística y un acto de abyecta cobardía. Deberías haber muerto en la Ciudad Siniestra, en vez de exceder los límites de tu propia utilidad. Armaste demasiado revuelo».
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Haemonculi starts to talk — with all the usual arrogance:{/n} "Specimen. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}meet again{/d}. Your escape from Commorragh was both a statistical anomaly and an act of abject cowardice. You should have died in the Dark City, instead of overstepping the limits of your own usefulness. You caused too much commotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno de los hemónculos empieza a hablar con su arrogancia de costumbre.{/n} «{mf|El|La} espécimen. Nos volvemos a encontrar. Tu fuga de Commorragh fue una anomalía estadística y un acto de abyecta cobardía. Deberías haber muerto en la Ciudad Siniestra, en vez de exceder los límites de tu propia utilidad. Armaste demasiado revuelo».
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}L'un des hémoncules se met à parler avec son arrogance habituelle :{/n} « Spécimen... Ainsi, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}nos chemins se croisent à nouveau{/d}. Votre évasion de Commorragh était à la fois une anomalie statistique et un acte d'une immonde lâcheté. Vous auriez dû mourir dans la Cité Crépusculaire plutôt que d'outrepasser les limites de votre utilité. Vous n'êtes qu'{mf|un perturbateur|une perturbatrice}. »
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Haemonculi starts to talk — with all the usual arrogance:{/n} "Specimen. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}meet again{/d}. Your escape from Commorragh was both a statistical anomaly and an act of abject cowardice. You should have died in the Dark City, instead of overstepping the limits of your own usefulness. You caused too much commotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un des hémoncules se met à parler avec son arrogance habituelle.{/n} « Le spécimen. Ainsi, nos chemins se croisent à nouveau. Votre évasion de Commorragh était à la fois une anomalie statistique et un acte d'une immonde lâcheté. Vous auriez dû périr dans la Cité Crépusculaire plutôt que d'outrepasser les limites de votre utilité. Vous n'êtes qu'{mf|un perturbateur|une perturbatrice}. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスの1人が、いつものように横柄な態度で話し始める。{/n}「標本か、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}また会ったな{/d}。お前がコモラフから脱走したことは統計上の異常であり、卑怯で臆病な行為だった。お前は役に立たなくなったのに生き残るのではなく、仄暗き都で死ぬべきだったのだ。お前は騒ぎを起こしすぎた」
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Haemonculi starts to talk — with all the usual arrogance:{/n} "Specimen. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}meet again{/d}. Your escape from Commorragh was both a statistical anomaly and an act of abject cowardice. You should have died in the Dark City, instead of overstepping the limits of your own usefulness. You caused too much commotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスの1人が、いつものように横柄な態度で話し始める。{/n}「標本か、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}また会ったな{/d}。お前がコモラフから脱走したことは統計上の異常であり、卑怯で臆病な行為だった。お前は役に立たなくなったのに生き残るのではなく、仄暗き都で死ぬべきだったのだ。お前は騒ぎを起こしすぎた」
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Haimonkuluslardan biri, olanca küstahlığıyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Numune. Yine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}karşılaştık{/d}. Commorragh'tan kaçışın, bir istatistiksel sapma olduğu kadar korkaklığının da apaçık deliliydi. Haddini bilecektin, Kara Şehir'de ölecektin. Gereğinden fazla sıkıntı çıkardın."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Haemonculi starts to talk — with all the usual arrogance:{/n} "Specimen. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}meet again{/d}. Your escape from Commorragh was both a statistical anomaly and an act of abject cowardice. You should have died in the Dark City, instead of overstepping the limits of your own usefulness. You caused too much commotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkuluslardan biri, olanca küstahlığıyla konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Numune. Yine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusAlive}karşılaştık{/d}. Commorragh'dan kaçışın bir istatistiksel sapma olduğu kadar korkaklığının da apaçık deliliydi. Haddini bilecektin, Kara Şehir'de ölecektin. Gereğinden fazla sıkıntı çıkardın."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus
